title: Syeda Hakimah (sa)
text: DESC: Daughter of Imam Muhammad al-Jawad (al-Taqi) (as)
DESC: The holy tomb of this lady lies behind the side of the two Imamsâ€™ feet and is attached to their tombs.
DESC: You can recite the Ziyarah of "Syeda Fatima Masooma Qom (sa)" in the honor of this esteemed lady.
